pipelines.name: separate_264_scaled
pipeline_array: ksvideosrc device-index=0 do-stats=true blocksize=16384 ! queue max-size-bytes=33554432 !
videoscale ! video/x-raw, width=2880, height=1620, format=I420, framerate=(fraction)30/1 !
nvh264enc preset=low-latency-hq qos=true rc-mode=cbr bitrate=16384 ! video/x-h264,profile=high !
ksvideosrc device-index=1 do-stats=true blocksize=16384 ! queue max-size-bytes=33554432 !
videoscale ! video/x-raw, width=2880, height=1620, format=I420, framerate=(fraction)30/1 !
nvh264enc preset=low-latency-hq qos=true rc-mode=cbr bitrate=16384 ! video/x-h264,profile=high !
directsoundsrc ! volume volume=0.5 ! queue ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw, rate=44100, channels=2 !
audioconvert ! audioresample ! opusenc ! rtpopuspay ! udpsink host=192.168.0.255 port=7000

pipelines.name: joined_264_scaled
pipeline_array: ksvideosrc device-index=0 do-stats=true do-timestamp=true blocksize=16384 name=left
ksvideosrc device-index=1 do-stats=true do-timestamp=true blocksize=16384 name=right
videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 !
videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 !
nvh264enc preset=low-latency-hq qos=true rc-mode=cbr-hq bitrate=16384 zerolatency=true !

pipelines.name: tee_stuff
pipeline: t. ! queue ! videoscale ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw, format=RGBA, width=1496, height=748 ! appsink sync=false name=videoSink

pipelines.name: 265_full_many_thread
pipeline_array: left. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! tee name=splitLeft ! queue ! videorate ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

right. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! tee name=splitRight ! queue ! videorate ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

queue ! gldownload ! queue ! nvh265enc preset=low-latency-hq gop-size=90 rc-mode=cbr-ld-hq bitrate=8192 ! video/x-h265 ! queue ! rtph265pay config-interval=1 aggregate-mode=2 ! application/x-rtp,media=video,encoding-name=H265,payload=(int)96 !

directsoundsrc ! volume volume=0.8 ! queue ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw, rate=48000, channels=2 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! opusenc ! rtpopuspay ! application/x-rtp,media=audio,encoding-name=OPUS,payload=(int)127 ! udpsink host=192.168.0.255 port=7000 sync=false
videotestsrc pattern=black ! video/x-raw, width=1496, height=748 ! previewCompositor.

splitLeft. ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! videoscale ! queue ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw, format=RGBA, width=748, height=748,framerate=(fraction)30/1 ! queue ! previewCompositor.

splitRight. ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! videoscale ! queue ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw, format=RGBA, width=748, height=748,framerate=(fraction)30/1 ! queue ! previewCompositor.

pipelines.name: 265_full_many_thread_no_preview
pipeline_array: ksvideosrc device-index=1 blocksize=16384 name=right glstereomix name=mix

left. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! queue ! videorate ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

right. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! queue ! videorate ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

queue ! gldownload ! queue ! nvh265enc preset=low-latency-hq gop-size=90 rc-mode=cbr-ld-hq bitrate=12000 zerolatency=true ! video/x-h265 ! queue ! rtph265pay config-interval=1 aggregate-mode=2 ! application/x-rtp,media=video,encoding-name=H265,payload=(int)96 !

directsoundsrc ! volume volume=0.8 ! queue ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw, rate=48000, channels=2 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! opusenc ! rtpopuspay ! application/x-rtp,media=audio,encoding-name=OPUS,payload=(int)127 ! udpsink host=192.168.2.255 port=7000

pipelines.name: 265_full_combined_preview
pipeline_array: left. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

right. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

queue ! tee name=previewTee ! gldownload ! queue ! nvh265enc preset=low-latency-hq rc-mode=cbr-ld-hq bitrate=12000 ! video/x-h265 ! queue max-size-bytes=0 max-size-time=0 max-size-buffers=0 ! rtph265pay config-interval=1 aggregate-mode=2 ! application/x-rtp,media=video,encoding-name=H265,payload=(int)96 !

directsoundsrc ! volume volume=0.8 ! queue ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw, rate=48000, channels=2 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! opusenc ! rtpopuspay ! application/x-rtp,media=audio,encoding-name=OPUS,payload=(int)127 ! udpsink host=192.168.0.255 port=7000 sync=false

right. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

pipelines.name: 265_mpegts
pipeline_array: left. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

right. ! rawvideoparse width=3840 height=2160 format=nv12 framerate=30/1 ! video/x-raw,width=3840,height=2160,framerate=30/1,format=NV12 ! queue ! videocrop top=0 left=-1 right=-1 bottom=0 ! video/x-raw,width=2160,height=2160 ! glupload ! queue ! glcolorconvert ! queue ! glcolorbalance brightness=-0.0 ! queue ! glcolorscale ! queue ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory),width=2048,height=2048 ! mix.

queue ! tee name=previewTee ! gldownload ! queue ! nvh265enc preset=low-latency-hq qos=true rc-mode=cbr-ld-hq bitrate=16000 ! video/x-h265,alignment=au ! queue ! h265parse config-interval=-1 ! mux. mux. ! rtpmp2tpay ! application/x-rtp,media=video,encoding-name=MP2T,payload=96 !
